snippet: Rebels from the Shabab militant group attacked a military base in southern Somalia early Monday, killing at least 10 soldiers and burning two military vehicles, officials said.
abstract: Shabab rebels attack military base in southern Somalia, killing at least 10 soldiers.
lead_paragraph: Rebels from the Shabab militant group attacked a military base in southern Somalia early Monday, killing at least 10 soldiers and burning two military vehicles, officials said.
